description: This file sets up an AI agent with OpenAI and SQLite storage, then interacts with it by printing responses and session messages.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with models and storage.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the agent's response to a prompt.

methods.name: get_messages_for_session
methods.description: Retrieves messages for the current session.
